thread.title: Twenty Five Hundred Electronic Table Game Active Units Milestone Reached
thread.title_full: Twenty Five Hundred Electronic Table Game Active Units Milestone Reached - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Twenty Five Hundred Electronic Table Game Active Units Milestone Reached
text:
Aruze Gaming America Reached Twenty Five Hundred Electronic Table Game Active Units Milestone
Las Vegas, Nevada (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
Aruze Gaming America, Inc.’s (“Aruze”) portfolio of Electronic Table Games (“ETGs”) has transcended two thousand five hundred units, globally, which are currently active in the field. Included in this count are the Award Winning Shoot to Win Craps and Lucky Big Wheel, Dealer’s Angels Blackjack, Dealer’s Angels Baccarat, Lucky Sic Bo, Roulette Angels, Roulette King and the latest edition to the Aruze portfolio, Virtual Roulette.
Virtual Roulette debuted in North America recently, during the 2015 Global Gaming Expo, with Aruze successfully completing the first installation at the Palazzo Las Vegas. Now in their 4th year of commercialization and continuing to enjoy record placements, Shoot to Win Craps and Lucky Big Wheel, are considered the industry’s leading electronic versions of Craps and Big Six.
Lucky Sic Bo, Aruze’s number one seller, dominates the Macau market and is being played from the Philippines to Singapore, Australia to the United States.
Aruze’s ETGs incorporate innovative technology that offers players a more fun and interactive experience with the appearance of control. For example, players can shoot the dice in Shoot to Win Craps, spin the wheel in Lucky Big Wheel, squeeze the cards in Dealer’s Angels Baccarat, and now shoot the ball in Virtual Roulette.
About Aruze Gaming America, Inc.
Aruze, based in Las Vegas, designs, develops, and manufactures slot machines and gaming devices for the global casino market. With subsidiaries in Australia, South Africa, Macau and Japan, Aruze produces highly innovative gaming products, including high resolution video and stepper slot machines, communal gaming products, and multi-terminal devices.
For more news and information about Aruze, please visit http://www.aruzegaming.com .
 //www.prweb.com/releases/aruze-gaming-america/electronic-table-games/prweb13023041.htm
